text: For Your Pleasure is the second studio album by English rock band Roxy Music. It was released on 23 March, 1973 through Island Records. It went to number 4 in the United Kingdom, number 193 in the United States, number 41 in Australia and number 15 in Norway. It was ranked #351 on the Rolling Stone 500 Greatest Albums of Time in 2020. ==Track listing== ==References== Category:1973 albums Category:Roxy Music albums
title: For Your Pleasure
